short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free and offline collection of tools for development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a collection of dev tools that is completely free and open source. It works entirely offline, there is no analytics or telemetry and no cost at all. It is inspired by a Windows app called DevToys and was created only to make it easy to have some tools available on other systems. More gadgets to come soon.
